metadata.title: How to Pin Comments on YouTube 2025: Pinned Comment Strategy
metadata.description: Pin comments on YouTube videos. Use pinned comments strategically for engagement.

hero.headline: How to Pin Comments on YouTube
hero.subheadline: Feature important messages. Strategic use of pinned comments.

sections.content: Pinned comments stay at the top of your comment section, seen by every viewer. Use them to add context, engage viewers, promote related content, or highlight community members. A strategic pinned comment drives engagement and conversation.

faq.question: Can I pin multiple comments?
faq.answer: No—only one pinned comment per video at a time. Pinning new comment unpins previous. Choose strategically or rotate over time.

faq.question: Does pinning notify the commenter?
faq.answer: Yes—they receive notification that their comment was pinned. Great for community building. Makes viewers feel valued.

faq.question: Should I pin my own or viewer comments?
faq.answer: Both work. Your own for questions, corrections, CTAs. Viewer comments for community building. Mix based on video needs.

faq.question: Can I edit pinned comments?
faq.answer: Can edit your own pinned comment anytime. Can't edit viewer comments. If correction needed, consider pinning your own instead.
